verbs.description: [ARG0: plants] [R-ARG0: that] [V: live] [ARGM-LOC: in the deep sea] [ARGM-TMP: while you may not think about it] the deep sea has its own ecosystem with different plants and animals the plants and animals that live in these cold environments however require special adaptations light does not fully penetrate to the sea floor but these plants still undergo photosynthesis poseidonia
